revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cerulean Cave |image = |caption = An overhead map of the Cerulean Cave. |tokens = 2,500 |location = North of Cerulean City }} '''Cerulean Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health !! Base Health (Boss) !! Egg Steps Given |- | Rhydon || 24595 || 143675 || 55 |- | Mewtwo || 24595 || 215512 || 55 |}
===Pokémon===
* Arbok * Raichu * Sandslash * Golbat * Parasect * Venomoth * Kadabra * Magneton * dodrio * Hypno * Ditto * Wigglytuff * Electrode * Marowak * Cahnsey * Rhydon (boss) * Mewtwo (boss)
===Items===
